fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player with an Ice Mark. Their touch will become one of ice, roleblocking their target instead of the intended effect.
- **Blood of Ice** - Redirect up to 3 players with an Ice Mark to themselves and roleblock their targets, then coldsnap. You may only use this ability once each game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune.
- Whenever a player is roleblocked, they are given an Ice Mark and you learn their name.
